title: Create apology website for Maham with interactive reveal

requirements.summary: Create a landing page that displays 'Maham' as a clickable name element
acceptanceCriteria: The name 'Maham' is displayed prominently on the landing page
The name is clearly clickable with appropriate hover states
Clicking the name reveals or navigates to the apology message

file_operations.description: Add state management for reveal interaction and render the clickable 'Maham' name element with appropriate event handlers and styling for hover states

requirements.summary: Display an apology message that appears after clicking the name 'Maham'
acceptanceCriteria: Message is clearly readable and well-formatted

file_operations.description: Add the apology message content that conditionally renders based on the reveal state, ensuring it is hidden initially and displays with proper formatting and readability after the name is clicked

requirements.summary: Implement a pink and red color scheme throughout the website with all text rendered in white
acceptanceCriteria: Primary colors used are pink and red
All text elements display in white color
Color scheme is applied consistently across all components
Sufficient contrast exists between background colors and white text for readability

file_operations.description: Define CSS custom properties or utility classes for pink and red color scheme, set global text color to white, and ensure consistent application across the application with sufficient contrast for readability
Extend the Tailwind theme configuration to include pink and red as primary colors in the color palette, ensuring they are available for use throughout the components

requirements.summary: Design a creative, romantic visual theme with elegant typography and smooth transitions that complement the apology context
acceptanceCriteria: Visual design feels cohesive and appropriate for an apology message
Typography choices enhance readability and emotional tone
Transitions and interactions feel smooth and polished
Layout is clean and focused on the core interaction

file_operations.description: Import and configure elegant font families appropriate for a romantic apology context, define CSS transitions for smooth reveal animations, and establish layout styles that create a clean, focused design
Apply elegant typography classes, smooth CSS transitions for the reveal interaction, and implement a centered, clean layout structure that focuses attention on the name and apology message
